I have developed a specialized Drone to fell Trees. It fells all known trees but also huge mushrooms and provides the stem, saplings und fruits to the Dronestation.

The Forstmaster can be placed (with §lsneak + right click§r) at a Dronestation. It processes all near targets within a 11 block range. To disassemble the drone I need to use a scrench with §lsneak  + right click§r.
I should considering to implement a replanting function.
